name: CMP 2016: BBQ Bob Series
description:
CMP 2016-01 - Broke Down in KC
The definitive Maria Mecurial tribute singer has gone missing, but why? Engine trouble lands your team in KC. Coincidentally, a local Mr. Johnson has a milk run for you. Quick and easy nuyen, right?

CMP 2016-02 - The Midwest Farmer's Daughter
Allied with the KC Mob, Agri-Seeds, is expanding and everyone sellsâ€¦ or else. A team is hired to protect an executive's family from aggressive negotiations during an attempted hostile takeover. Simple and easy, right?

CMP 2016-03 - Today Isn't Your Day, Tomorrow Isn't Looking Good Either
What happens when the hit team becomes the targets?

CMP 2016-04 - Mage Without A Face
The mob loves hitters, but they love cleaning up loose ends even more.
notes: A series of adventures played at conventions, not relesed afterwards.
